name: Welcome, Archer
description:
Made for SAGJ 2021. 

The theme was "The Urge To Discover". I decided to try a less literal approach to the theme and explored the idea of discovering synergies with different upgrades and builds in a fast paced archery arena.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Press, hold & release left click to shoot an arrow
  • i to invert mouse look
  • 9 / 0 to decrease / increase mouse sensitivity
  • Space to jump and wall jump
  • Right click to dash

Credits:

  • Wicked tunes by Nana Kwabena and Bobby Richards on YouTube audio library.
